description: Retrieves the details of a SIP rule, such as the rule ID, name, triggers, and target endpoints.

nested_items.name: Disabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the SIP rule is enabled or disabled. You must disable a rule before you can delete it.

nested_items.name: TriggerType
nested_items.description: The type of trigger set for a SIP rule, either a phone number or a URI request host name.

nested_items.name: TriggerValue
nested_items.description: The value set for a SIP rule's trigger type. Either a phone number or a URI hostname.

nested_items.name: TargetApplications
nested_items.description: The target SIP media application and other details, such as priority and AWS Region, to be specified in the SIP rule. Only one SIP rule per AWS Region can be provided.

nested_items.name: SipMediaApplicationId
nested_items.description: The ID of a rule's target SIP media application.

nested_items.name: Priority
nested_items.description: The priority setting of a rule's target SIP media application.

nested_items.name: AwsRegion
nested_items.description: The AWS Region of a rule's target SIP media application.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the SIP rule was created, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the SIP rule was updated, in ISO 8601 format.
